landing.bio: Final year undergrad and a part-time web developer

experience.aboutWork: Developed websites for my clients using various web development approaches from WordPress to advanced web development technology like React
Built a Web Hosting service offering SSD-powered hosting primarily for students in a comparatively lower prices. The complete website was built using WordPress and WHMCS.
Maintaining the overall design and functioning of the website.

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy travelling a lot. I love mountains and I sincerely wish to explore different places and cultures throughout my life.
interests.paragraphTwo: I love listening to Electronic Dance Music and always love spending time on my laptop trying to mix songs on a DJ software or simply watching that week-long web series.
